member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.EnumStrings.EnumStringsAttribute
member.summary: Provides information to guide the production of an extension method to efficiently convert an enum value into string form.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.EnumStrings.EnumStringsAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.EnumStrings.EnumStringsAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The type of the enum to work with.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.EnumStrings.EnumStringsAttribute.EnumType
member.summary: Gets the type of the enum to annotate.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.EnumStrings.EnumStringsAttribute.ExtensionClassModifiers
member.summary: Gets or sets the modifiers to apply to the generated class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.EnumStrings.EnumStringsAttribute.ExtensionClassName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the generated class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.EnumStrings.EnumStringsAttribute.ExtensionMethodName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the generated extension method.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.EnumStrings.EnumStringsAttribute.ExtensionNamespace
member.summary: Gets or sets the namespace of the generated class.
